Name: Golden Bird
Ingredients: 20 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
20 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
10 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange 'beak' on rim.
Review: Fruity and sweet - an after dinner cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Golden Bird contains 150 calories
